title: Train fault causing slower service from Woodlands North to Caldecott

updates.text: [TEL]: Train services between Woodlands North to Gardens by the Bay have resumed. Free Regular Bus and Bus Bridging services have ceased.
[TEL]: Train services between WDN to GRB progressively resuming. Free regular buses and Bus Bridging services still available.
[TEL]: Due to a train fault, trains are moving slower from Woodlands North towards Caldecott. Free regular bus services between WDN to CDT.
[TEL]: Due to a train fault, trains are moving slower from Woodlands North towards Caldecott.
